Class ExperienceController

java.lang.Object
com.vk.placeprep.controller.ExperienceController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/experiences") public class ExperienceController extends Object
REST controller for managing interview experiences. Provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting interview experiences, as well as searching and summarizing experiences.
Since:
2025-10-26
Version:
1.0
Author:
Venkatesh K

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • searchExperiences

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ExperienceResponse> searchExperiences(@RequestParam(required=false) String companyName, @RequestParam(required=false) String jobRole, @RequestParam(required=false) String jobType, @RequestParam(required=false) String finalVerdict, @RequestParam(required=false) Boolean isAnonymous, @PageableDefault(size=10) org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserPrincipal currentUser)
      Searches for interview experiences based on various criteria with pagination support. All parameters are optional and can be combined for filtering.
      Parameters:
      companyName - Company name to filter by (case-insensitive partial match)
      jobRole - Job role to filter by (case-insensitive partial match)
      jobType - Type of job (e.g., INTERNSHIP, FULL_TIME)
      finalVerdict - Final outcome of the interview process
      isAnonymous - Filter by anonymous status
      pageable - Pagination information (page, size, sort)
      currentUser - Currently authenticated user (injected by Spring Security)
      Returns:
      A page of experience responses matching the criteria

    • getExperienceById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ExperienceResponse> getExperienceById(@PathVariable Long id, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserPrincipal currentUser)
      Retrieves a specific interview experience by its ID. Access control is applied based on the experience's privacy settings.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to retrieve
      currentUser - Currently authenticated user (injected by Spring Security)
      Returns:
      The requested experience with HTTP 200 OK, or an error response

    • createExperience

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ExperienceResponse> createExperience(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ExperienceRequest request, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserPrincipal currentUser)
      Creates a new interview experience. The experience will be associated with the currently authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      request - The experience data to create
      currentUser - Currently authenticated user (injected by Spring Security)
      Returns:
      The created experience with HTTP 200 OK, or an error response

    • updateExperience

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ExperienceResponse> updateExperience(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid ExperienceRequest request, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserPrincipal currentUser)
      Updates an existing interview experience. Only the owner of the experience can update it.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to update
      request - The updated experience data
      currentUser - Currently authenticated user (injected by Spring Security)
      Returns:
      The updated experience with HTTP 200 OK, or an error response

    • deleteExperience

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteExperience(@PathVariable Long id, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserPrincipal currentUser)
      Deletes an interview experience. Only the owner of the experience can delete it.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to delete
      currentUser - Currently authenticated user (injected by Spring Security)
      Returns:
      HTTP 204 NO_CONTENT on success, or an error response

    • getExperienceSummary

      @GetMapping("/{id}/summary") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getExperienceSummary(@PathVariable Long id, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserPrincipal currentUser)
      Retrieves a summary of a specific interview experience. Includes statistics about rounds, topics, and other aggregated data.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to summarize
      currentUser - Currently authenticated user (injected by Spring Security)
      Returns:
      The experience summary with HTTP 200 OK, or an error response

    • getAllTopics

      @GetMapping("/topics") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<String>> getAllTopics(@AuthenticationPrincipal UserPrincipal currentUser)
      Retrieves all unique interview topics from the current user's experiences.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - Currently authenticated user (injected by Spring Security)
      Returns:
      A set of unique topic strings with HTTP 200 OK

    • getUserExperiences

      @GetMapping("/me") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ExperienceResponse>> getUserExperiences(@RequestParam(required=false) String status, @PageableDefault(size=10) org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserPrincipal currentUser)
      Retrieves a paginated list of the current user's interview experiences. Can be filtered by interview status.
      Parameters:
      status - Optional status to filter by (e.g., OFFER_ACCEPTED, REJECTED)
      pageable - Pagination information (page, size, sort)
      currentUser - Currently authenticated user (injected by Spring Security)
      Returns:
      A page of the user's experiences with HTTP 200 OK
